latest.title: Transaction in Own Shares
latest.content:
9 Dec 2025 07:00
RNS Number : 7289K
Trustpilot Group PLC
09 December 2025
9 December 2025
Trustpilot Group plc
Transaction in own shares
Trustpilot Group plc ("Trustpilot" or the "Company")
announces that on 8 December
2025,
it purchased the following number of its ordinary shares of £0.01 each (the "Ordinary Shares") on the London Stock Exchange from
Deutsche Bank AG, London Branch (trading for these purposes as Deutsche Numis) ("Deutsche Numis")
, in accordance with the terms of the share buyback programme announced on
16 September 2025
(the "Buyback Programme").
Date of purchase:
8 December 2025
Aggregate number of Ordinary Shares purchased:
650,000
Lowest price paid per share (GBp):
150.40
Highest price paid per share (GBp):
155.00
Volume weighted average price paid per share (GBp):
153.26
Trustpilot intends to cancel all of the purchased shares.
Since 16 September 2025, the Company has purchased 11,658,734 Ordinary Shares for cancellation, at a cost (excluding dealing and associated costs) of ~£22,144,931.
In accordance with Article 5(1)(b) of Regulation (EU) No 596/2014 (as incorporated into UK domestic law by the European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018), a schedule of individual trades made by Deutsche Numis is available using the following link:
http://www.rns-pdf.londonstockexchange.com/rns/7289K_1-2025-12-8.pdf
